channel.title: Machine Learning on PBenavides
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on PBenavides

item.title: Automated Valuation Model - Lima
item.description: About the Project This project started in 2019 when I was trying to practice my web-scraping and Machine learning skills. It was the first personal project that I had been involved in, and it even was a start-up project idea that couldn’t be accomplished for many reasons. I learnt a lot from this and I dedicated a great amount of time to iterate over the ideas. Suddenly, it ended up being a Spatial Data Science project due to the advantage of the scraped data: geographically coordinates.

item.title: Experimentation Notebooks
item.description: These are Proof of Concept Notebooks where I’m replicating some tutorials or articles with my point of view or own data. I built this notebooks to keep a record of which use-cases I could make in the future and as personal note-taking of the topics that I’ve studied. Some of the topics I’m including in this notebooks are: Data_visualization: A calendar plot about USDPEN prices. FeatureEncoding Challenge: Kaggle competition about encoding techniques.

item.title: Lima - Real Estate Forecasting
item.description: Nevertheless, as be harangued them, the satisfaction and admiration unanimously excited by his costume were dissipated by his words; and when he reached that untoward conclusion: “As soon as his illustrious eminence, the cardinal, arrives, we will begin,” his voice was drowned in a thunder of hooting. “Begin instantly! The mystery! the mystery immediately!” shrieked the people. And above all the voices, that of Johannes de Molendino was audible, piercing the uproar like the fife’s derisive serenade: “Commence instantly!
